list.name: FAKE-INJURY
list.description: When Gray has full health, the next damage taken is reduced by <VALUE>%.
list.descriptionHtml: When Gray has full health, the next damage taken is reduced by %.

list.name: NEW-PERSPECTIVE
list.description: When Gray or his Allies use Doors, they recover <VALUE>% of their max hit points.
list.descriptionHtml: When Gray or his Allies use Doors, they recover % of their max hit points.
